Test.Description: Checks that VM loads class file which has Signature attribute in class info structure, method info structure and field info structure. Checks that Class.getTypeParameters() function returns array of length two. And the elements of the array represent TypeVariable objects of types T and T2 correspondingly. Checks that generic methods can be invoked and the class generic fields can be assigned with values of corresponding types. Covered assertions assert_class535_000_01 assert_class535_000_02 assert_class535_000_03 assert_class157_01 assert_class380_001 assert_class327_01 assert_class366_01
